hero.title: Improve your Chess Strategy
hero.subtitle: No more piles of books to read for learning theory. Develop your skills by solving strategic exercises adapted to your level.
hero.tagline: The best way to learn chess
hero.bestMove: Find the best move for white

features.title: Progress at your own pace
features.subtitle: Discover our features designed to help you become a better player
features.practiceDesc: No more passive memorization. Sharpen your strategic intuition by solving specially selected practical exercises.
features.adaptiveDesc: Exercises that evolve with your level for optimal and constant learning. The system adapts to your strengths and weaknesses.
features.communityDesc: Benefit from community advice and explanations on each exercise. Learn from the best players and share your knowledge.
features.freeDesc: No subscription, no hidden premium features, no ads. All content and features are available for free to all users.

community.title: Join our community
community.subtitle: Share, learn and progress with other chess enthusiasts
community.discussionsDesc: Exchange with other players on each exercise. Share your ideas, strategies and learn from collective experience to progress faster.
community.exercisesDesc: Each exercise is created, refined and validated by the community. Explanations are constantly improved to ensure optimal understanding of strategies.
community.learningDesc: Benefit from collective expertise to understand the subtleties of each position. Explanations are written to adapt to your level and strengthen your progression.
community.chessImage: Image of a community chess game
community.testimonialsQuote1: The community explanations allowed me to understand strategic concepts that I had never grasped before. I gained 200 Elo points in just two months!
community.testimonialsQuote2: I love contributing to exercises and seeing my explanations help other players. It's rewarding to be part of a community that helps each other and progresses together.
community.testimonialsQuote3: The fact that exercises are constantly improved by the community makes all the difference. The explanations are clear and adapted to all levels.
